thread.title: Listen to Ronald Bruner Jr. and Mac Miller's New Song “Sensation”
thread.title_full: Listen to Ronald Bruner Jr. and Mac Miller's New Song “Sensation”

author: Michelle Kim
title: Listen to Ronald Bruner Jr. and Mac Miller's New Song “Sensation”
text:
Open share drawer Listen to Ronald Bruner Jr. and Mac Miller's New Song “Sensation” From Bruner’s upcoming album Triumph , which features his brother Thundercat, Kamasi Washington, George Duke, and more Mac Miller photo by Dale Berman for Getty Images; Ronald Bruner Jr. photo by Ruff Draft 
Ronald Bruner Jr. has released a new song called “Sensation,” featuring Mac Miller and Los Angeles singer Danielle Withers. Rather than rapping as usual, Mac Miller sings throughout the song. Premiered by Thump , “Sensation” is the second track from Bruner Jr.’s forthcoming debut album, Triumph , which is out March 3 on World Galaxy/Alpha Pup. It follows previously released track “ Take Your Time ,” featuring Bruner Jr.’s brother Thundercat. Other guests on the album include Kamasi Washington, George Duke, and more. 

Watch Mac Miller's "Over/Under" on Pitchfork.tv: Artists In This Story
